tweet.text: PUBLIC PRESENTATION • Dec. 7, 2020 at 10:30am EST At the #HAC meeting, Dr. Alexander Poster will present on the Reagan administration’s response to HIV/AIDS, as documented in #FRUS To register for this free online event, please send an email to FortJL@state.gov (2/3) https://t.co/1yJbSfiD56
